CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "The fourth, fifth, and sixth grades of the Robert L. Vann School are to present on Friday at 7:30 P.M. in auditorium, an opereatta [sic] entitled "Four Feathers West." Pictures from the scenes are shown in the photos...Recall Happy Days - Rink and the Shamrocks are shown recalling the happy days in Ireland, the land in which the fairies dwell."
TitMainTitle: Two boys and two girls wearing costumes with shamrock hats, gathered on stage for performance of "Four Feathers West," Vann Elementary school
